57222.summary: Some customers in the Lochdale area of Burnaby are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57222.title: Jan 23 - Burnaby (Lochdale) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
